title: Slap Fighting During The Apocalypse 10.28.22
itunes:title: Slap Fighting During The Apocalypse 10.28.22
description:
In episode 1361, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, and host of Creature Feature, Katie Goldin, to discuss… UN: WE AREN’T EVEN F**KING CLOSE TO CUTTING EMISSIONS, It Turns Out That Pro Slap Fighting Leagues Are A Terrible Idea, You Know Who Doesn’t Love “Sexy Nurse” Costumes? A Lot of Nurses, Jeffrey Dahmer Is Already Ruining Halloween and more!

  1. UN: WE AREN’T EVEN F**KING CLOSE TO CUTTING EMISSIONS
  2. It Turns Out That Pro Slap Fighting Leagues Are A Terrible Idea
  3. Why are Arnold Schwarzenegger and Logan Paul hosting the Slap Fighting Championship? What is it?
  4. ‘Like 13-year-olds invented a sport’: face-slapping league gets go-ahead in Vegas
  5. Why sports experts are concerned about 'slap fighting'
  6. You Know Who Doesn’t Love “Sexy Nurse” Costumes? A Lot of Nurses
  7. Dressing up this Halloween? Skip the sexy nurse costume, says Quebec nursing order
  8. Why You Shouldn’t Be A Sexy Nurse For Halloween
  9. A Brief History of Sexy Nurses
  10. Jeffrey Dahmer Is Already Ruining Halloween
  11. JEFFREY DAHMER INSPIRED CLOTHES TAKEN OFF EBAY... Violates Violence Policy
  12. Jeffrey Dahmer Halloween costumes are a thing in 2022 and we're not laughing
  13. Google Trends' FrightGeist lists the most popular Halloween costumes of 2022. Is yours on it?

LISTEN: Little Flower by The Putbacks

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
